AssessmentDefinitionRefId.description: The reference record of the object associated with the suggested assessment.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who created the record.

PartyId.description: The party for whom the assessment is suggested.

SourceContextId.description: The context from which the suggested assessment definition record was created.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the suggested assessment.
